articles.author: Analysis by Lauren Dezenski, CNN
articles.title: Despite Trump's efforts, the transition is happening
articles.description: While President-elect Joe Biden was working to turn the wheels of government to his own administration, it seemed the current President was doing anything to halt -- or at the very least ignore -- that peaceful transfer of power.

articles.title: Watch Trump refuse to acknowledge reality at press conference
articles.description: President Donald Trump inched closer to acknowledging he will not be president after January 20, but stopped well short of recognizing his loss when vowing his administration wouldn't order new coronavirus lockdowns.
